text:
Radhika Apte Leaves The Global Audience & Critics Amazed With Her Outstanding Performance In The Wedding Guest
Radhika Apte Leaves The Global Audience & Critics Amazed With Her Outstanding Performance In The Wedding Guest
Radhika Apte has proved her mettle of acting with every film. In fact, the ace director Vikram Aditya Motwane has given her the title of female Rajkummar Rao and she obliged his compliment. And now after impressing the Indian audience with the terrific talent, she is winning global applause for her outstanding performance in The Wedding Guest.
Twitter
The film was released internationally where everyone is praising Radhika for her talent.
Twitter
The Wedding Guest is a Hollywood film featuring 'Slumdog Millionaire' star Dev Patel and Radhika Apte in pivotal roles. Both the actors have done a fabulous job, but Radhika has won the hearts of the critics and audiences.
Twitter
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
Huge raise from prominent publications like The New York Times, New York Post, APN News, The Young Folks, Indie wire, Radhika has only made her fans back home very proud.
Take a look at what New York Post said Radhika’s performance:
The Wedding Guest by Michael Winterbottom, feat. Dev Patel, @radhika_apte, @jimSarbh, and @theHarishKhanna, opens in Los Angeles and New York on March 1st, and in other cities on March 8th.
Trailer: https://t.co/qkdjHPBMBT@IFCFilms pic.twitter.com/sNVDoPIpsb — CinemaRare (@CinemaRareIN) February 2, 2019
Stars @radhika_apte and #DevPatel share a laugh after world premiere of Michael Winterbottom's "The Wedding Guest". This thriller takes them (and us) thru Pakistan and India, and a woman's path to control and freedom. #TiFF2018 pic.twitter.com/ZoMD0cnT8u — Julia Deans (@juliadeans) September 8, 2018
Radhika has had a phenomenal 2018 and looks like 2019 is even brighter for her.
